tweet: The militia attack on our embassy is further evidence that Iran is increasing its provocation & destabilizing actions. Iraq must take responsibility to help defend our embassy. Iran must feel the condemnation of every civilized nation & our sanctions on Iran must tighten further.

Today’s funding bills protect rural Utah communities:
✔️ Reauthorizes programs that support rural law enforcement, county services, and schools
✔️ Funds wildfire suppression & prevention activities
✔️ Helps @BLMnational manage wild horses & burros https://www.romney.senate.gov/utah-priorities-included-end-year-funding-bills …

Raising the tobacco age to 21 helps protect kids from addiction. Today’s funding bills also:
✔️ Permanently repeals the medical device tax
✔️ Lowers health care costs for millions of Americans
✔️ Orders @US_FDA review of vaping cartridges to ensure they’re tamper proof

Important to our national security:
✔️ Funds nearly 100 F-35s (maintained & repaired at Utah’s @HAFB)
✔️ Modernizes our missile defense system
✔️ Reauthorizes our E-Verify program

I voted for today’s funding bills—while far from perfect—because they contained legislation I fought for that reduces youth vaping, supports Utah’s @HAFB, repeals harmful Obamacare taxes, and protects rural Utah communities. pic.twitter.com/O3579HH8CQ

I voted in favor of imposing sanctions on Russia at @SenateForeign today because the United States must send a strong message to Russia: we will not tolerate your bad behavior. Look forward to continuing to work with my colleagues on this bill before it heads to the Senate Floor.

Russia consistently opposes the best interests of not just the US, but entire regions of the world. Russia has interfered in our elections and those of our allies, conducts malicious cyberattacks, and imprisons and assassinates political dissidents.

I fought to ensure the #FY20NDAA included funding for F-35 maintenance and military construction projects at Utah’s @HAFB, and a measure I authored to protect our national security from the growing threat that China poses. https://www.romney.senate.gov/romney-applauds-passage-defense-bill-critical-provisions-national-security-utahs-hill-air-force …

We're urging the @DeptOfDefense to address the dangers posed by our reliance on foreign drug makers.
